channel.title: Sig #3, my best yet =] R/C Plz
channel.description:
By: Jarod R Billions Made: June 20, 2007 Made With: ©Gimp
[size=7pt]Rate & Comment on sig please![/size]
Render: http://www.planetrenders.net/renders/displayimage.php?pos=-5894 Total layers: 41 Hours put into this: 2 hr [IMG]http://i18.tinypic.com/4mtbu5j.png[/img]
I was going to put a border, but since I am to tired. I quit on this lol... the border was going to be different though.

item.title: Sig #3, my best yet =] R/C Plz
item.dc:creator: @exe626 exe626
item.description:
@exe626 wrote:

If you made all those ‘hard ass’ designs in the background, may I please see your .gmp file. Seeing as I have gimp I would like to see how you made it.

item.title: Sig #3, my best yet =] R/C Plz
item.dc:creator: @FastBallz FastBawlz
item.description:
@FastBallz wrote:

HPC_Jarod:

thing is…you didn’t make it & it was way more then 5 layer, more like 20 of them…

Where does me making it fall into this?

If you combine all the brush layers then there will be.

1 Text , 1 Background , 1 Render , 1 Brush…

Less then 5 .

If you made it 41 layers, There must be alot with nothing…

Read full topic

item.title: Sig #3, my best yet =] R/C Plz
item.dc:creator: @goatee goatee
item.description:
@goatee wrote:

What?

Okay the signature isnt that good to be putting your name up next to it. The render has a black border… WTF? and it isn’t even cut nicely (not blaming you but you could of picked a better one).

That didn’t take you two hours… I could do what you did in a few minutes. Get the render, duplicate, radial blur, tech brush, not very nice text and carelessy slap a dodgy render on top.

But then again its your third and its made in GIMP (hahahaha GIMP… ahmagad i hate that thing, it’s hardly any better than paint.) so I’ll give you a 6/10. Keep trying.

Read full topic

item.source: Sig #3, my best yet =] R/C Plz

item.title: Sig #3, my best yet =] R/C Plz
item.dc:creator: @FastBallz FastBawlz
item.description:
@FastBallz wrote:

[quote=“HPC_Jarod, post:3, topic:114383”]Well…it actually depends on which kinda of border you have to make it non-annoying. All made from scratch except render.

I duplicate the render 3 times and spreaded them out, then motion blurred it (in photo shop its a radial blue). the original one i kept on top to blend in with the background, then i made some decorations in the other background layer with the bush tools. i added random numbers in x5 font & name in x15 font. Around the name i made another decoration for it - I put scared with the brushes there, then painted inside it and turned the transparency down to 50%. :D, if i know how to make circles better my sig would have been better, but i’ll learn.[/quote]

While using the circle marquee tool, choose fixed size and make them the same size

ex: 40x40

And oo Radial Blue? And Bush tools?.. Never heard of those…

GET BETTER RENDERS.

Read full topic
item.source: Sig #3, my best yet =] R/C Plz

item.source: Sig #3, my best yet =] R/C Plz

item.title: Sig #3, my best yet =] R/C Plz
item.dc:creator: @HPC_Jarod HPC_Jarod
item.description:
@HPC_Jarod wrote:

Well…it actually depends on which kinda of border you have to make it non-annoying. All made from scratch except render.

I duplicate the render 3 times and spreaded them out, then motion blurred it (in photo shop its a radial blue). the original one i kept on top to blend in with the background, then i made some decorations in the other background layer with the bush tools. i added random numbers in x5 font & name in x15 font. Around the name i made another decoration for it - I put scared with the brushes there, then painted inside it and turned the transparency down to 50%. :D, if i know how to make circles better my sig would have been better, but i’ll learn.

Read full topic
